definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
act at one's discretion/act as one sees fit
to treat people according to their rank and one's relationship with them (idiom)
to act prudently/steering a cautious course

sentences.english: I have no idea what they are going to say, so I'll have to play it by ear.
sentences.chinese: 我一点不知道他们将会说什么，所以我只好见机行事。

sentences.english: She always does everything by the book.
She marked the date on her calendar.
sentences.chinese: 她在她的行事历上给那个日期做记号。

sentences.english: It insists upon one’s performing an act of lucidity as one performs an act of faith.
sentences.chinese: 它坚持要求人们行事明晰透彻，如同执着于信仰。

sentences.english: All the people will hear and be afraid, and will not be contemptuous again.
sentences.chinese: 众百姓都要听见害怕，不再擅敢行事。

sentences.english: A FIFTH JEW: No man can tell how God worketh.
sentences.chinese: 没人能说明白，上帝是如何行事的。

sentences.english: You do not want to rush this along.
But the firm is aware of this, and has trodden carefully as a result.
sentences.chinese: 但是公司已经看到了这一点，已经开始小心行事了。

sentences.english: For I knew that you would deal very treacherously And would be called a transgressor from the womb.
sentences.chinese: 我原知道你行事极其诡诈，你从母腹里便称为悖逆的。

sentences.english: You don't haveto be a footloose young traveler to adopt this frugal mindset.
sentences.chinese: 你不必一定要做这种节俭行事的自由旅行者。

sentences.english: So far, they are all more or less on track.
sentences.chinese: 目前来看，他们都或多或少地在按计划行事。

sentences.english: Please see attachment for 2010 Fall calendar.
sentences.chinese: 下学期行事历在附件中。

sentences.english: No longer will they follow the stubbornness of their evil hearts.
sentences.chinese: 他们必不再随从自己顽梗的恶心行事。

sentences.english: I'm going to set it, do it the right way.
sentences.chinese: 我会安定下来，然后按正确的方法行事。

definition: to work/to handle matters/to have a job
to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
